channel.title: P16 v6, how do i let npc talk?
channel.description: the way i like it is that i just can click the 'talk-to' option and that the npc talks then :P but how do i get this working? can any1 explain this to me? thx

item.source: P16 v6, how do i let npc talk?

item.title: P16 v6, how do i let npc talk?
item.dc:creator: @Jump_On_Java Jump On Java
item.description:
@Jump_On_Java wrote:

Open Up NpcHandler, Press Ctrl And F And Search For -

"Moo"

Below The Last } Paste This -

if (npcs[i].npcType == [NpcId] { if (misc.random2(50) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "[NpcSpeech]"; } }

Change The [NpcId] To The Npc Id That You Would Like To Speak, Then Change The [NpcSpeech] To What You Want The Npc To Say.

[b]If You Have Any Errors Please Private Message Me.

Enjoy ![/b]

Read full topic
item.source: P16 v6, how do i let npc talk?
